description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Omaha, United States. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Midwest Getaway in Historic Omaha Hotel
hotels.description: Experience the Midwest at the Kimpton Cottonwood Hotel, an IHG Hotel in Omaha’s historic Blackstone District. A reimagining of the famed Blackstone Hotel - built in 1916 and rumoured to be the birthplace of the Reuben sandwich - this city escape places you in the centre of Omaha’s most lively neighbourhood. Enjoy contemporary dining at The Committee Chophouse, then grab a nightcap at the tastefully decorated Cottonwood Room.

seo.title: Hotel a Omaha - Stati Uniti Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Omaha, United States con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
